transArray.content: The service is considerate, both the front desk and the cleaning lady are very nice and polite. The room is clean and comfortable. It's a good business trip experience.

Seeing your thoughtful comments, we also feel your enthusiasm and kindness from across the air. We think that the guest guest must be a particularly warm person. When we meet in a huge crowd, we must cherish Hanting's service. I hope you like it and we will try our best to bring you more beautiful memories! Little Lord! We are waiting for your return!
